snippet: The musical adaptation of "Rebecca," the Daphne du Maurier novel, will now open at the Broadhurst Theater on Nov. 18. It previously postponed a planned April 22 opening after producers were unable to raise the show's $12 million capitalization in...
abstract: The musical adaptation of "Rebecca," the Daphne du Maurier novel, will now open at the Broadhurst Theater on Nov. 18. It previously postponed a planned April 22 opening after producers were unable to raise the show's $12 million capitalization in time.

headline.main: Ghost Story 'Rebecca,' Halted by Mortal Problems, Sets New Broadway Dates
